overview: Sleeping Sluts is the story of five stacked girls who think about sex 24/7. They love to play kinky role-modeling games with their boyfriends. Playing out their fantasies, they pretend their studs are Peeping Toms as they go about their daily routines. Then it's time to fuck! Starring Monique L'Amour, Trish Bailey, Kerra Dawson, Trisha Banks and Lily Valentine.
title: Sleeping Sluts
